programs.program:
as principal admin password "admin" do
set all_records = ""
set records = []
append to records with {name = "salls", age = "20" }
append to records with {name = "yan", age = "30" }
create principal salls "salls"
set delegation all_records admin read -> salls
set delegation all_records admin append -> salls
return "success"
***

as principal salls password "salls" do
foreach rec in all_records replacewith "salls"
set rec = "xx"
return records
***
